H1_split_answer1:
Here are 10 epic dialogues from the movie "Inception":

1. "You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling."
2. "I’m not sure I understand. You’re saying that you can’t tell the difference between your dreams and reality?"
3. "An idea is like a virus. Resilient. Highly contagious. The smallest seed of an idea can grow. It can grow to define or destroy you."
4. "What is the most resilient parasite? An idea. A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules."
5. "You’re waiting for a train. A train that will take you far away. You know where you hope this train will take you, but you can’t know for sure."
6. "I can’t keep doing this. I can’t keep doing this. I can’t keep doing this."
7. "We create the world of the dream. We bring the subject into that dream and they fill it with their secrets."
8. "You’re not going to be able to wake up. You’re going to have to let go."
9. "This is your chance. You can’t let it go."
10. "The dream is real. The dream is real. The dream is real."

These lines capture the essence of the film's complex themes and the depth of its characters.
H1_split_answer2:
Here are 10 famous words and phrases from "The Princess Bride":

1. "As you wish."
2. "Inconceivable!"
3. "Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die."
4. "Life is pain, Highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something."
5. "Have fun storming the castle!"
6. "You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means."
7. "True love is the greatest thing in the world."
8. "There's a shortage of perfect breasts in this world. It would be a pity to damage yours."
9. "I am not left-handed!"
10. "The Princess Bride." (The title itself has become iconic!)

These quotes capture the charm and wit of the film!
